contentrichtext.text: {{Use dmy dates|date=May 2013}} '''Zigmantas Balčytis''' (born 16 November 1953 in [[Šilutė district municipality]]) is a former acting [[Prime Minister of Lithuania|Prime Minister]] of [[Lithuania]]. He took office on 1 June 2006 following the resignation of [[Algirdas Brazauskas]], but failed to be approved by the Parliament to become Prime Minister. He was succeeded on 4 July by [[Gediminas Kirkilas]]. Balčytis is a member of the [[Social Democratic Party of Lithuania]] and was Minister of Finance in the Brazauskas government. ==References== * [http://www.europarl.europa.eu/members/expert/committees/view.do;jsessionid=78141DFF3128B2D566950EC017D9F176.node1?language=EN&id=96680]. ''Zigmantas BALČYTIS''.
